tags.name: Files

tags.name: Releases

get.summary: Zip archive of the CPT standard distribution data files
get.description: Provides a temporary download URL to the zip archive of the standard CPT distribution files. By default a URL to the most recent release files is returned.

parameters.name: release
parameters.description: ID of a previous release (i.e. ANNUAL-2023 or PLA-Q2-2022)

303.description: successful creation of a time-limited download URL

get.summary: Release data in descending order of date
get.description: Allows user to query for updates to expose release data in descending order of date
